name: Tails' Skypatrol
summary:
Tails' Skypatrol is an LCD game created for distribution at McDonald's restaurants. They were offered as a part of Happy Meals for a limited time in 2003. There are two buttons on the game which control up and down movement.

The objective of the game is for Tails to collect rings by moving up and down. There are no obstacles on this game. Collecting 30 rings will increase the speed and level. Missing 10 rings will end the game.
